timeline.message:
Add DelegatingHiveSplitLoader

ManifestHiveSplitLoader has the logic to read filenamse,size from
partition object and add splits to splitSource. But not all partitions
might contain the list of filenames and sizes.Hence we need
DelegatingHiveSplitLoader to create both HiveSplitLoader
and ManifestHiveSplitLaoder.

listFiles call to underlying storage.
